aboutDescription: I got into Front-end Development quite recently and everything I've learned so far was from various books, online courses and websites about development. I'm trained as a information technology specialist. I'm a fast learner, always hungry for more knowledge and I try my best to do everything, be it my personal projects or work tasks, the best way I can.
weatherDescription: Prosta aplikacja pokazująca aktualną pogodę na podstawie lokalizacji GPS lub wprowadzonej nazwy miasta, stworzona w HTML, CSS i czystym JavaScripcie (ES6). Dane pogodowe dostarcza Open Weather Map API. Typ aplikacji to PWA (100% w Lighthouse).
weatherAlt: Screenshot of a Simple Weather App main page
weatherCode: Check Simple Weather App source code
challengeDescription: Strona wykonana według projektu klienta, stworzona przy użyciu HTML5, CSS3 i jQuery. Za responsywność odpowiada w pełni Flexbox. Dodatkowo użyte pluginy: Lightbox.js.
challengeAlt: Screenshot of a Weekly Webdev Challenge 37 main page
challengeCode: Check Weekly Webdev Challenge 37 source code
interiorDescription: Based on a clients project, made using HTML5, CSS3 and jQuery. Responsiveness by Flexbox. Extra plugins: Lightbox.js.
interiorAlt: Screenshot of a interiorideas.pl main page
sleszynskiDescription: Based on a clients project, made using HTML5, CSS3 and vanilla JavaScript. Responsiveness by Bootstrap 3.3.7. Extra plugins: Lightbox.js.
sleszynskiAlt: Screenshot of a msleszynski.pl main page
todoDescription: Simple To-Do app made entirely in vanilla JavaScript. It allows the user to add and delete tasks, change a task status, clean the whole list and save it in the browser localStorage. You can check the plans for next releases in GitHub repository Readme file.
todoAlt: Screenshot of a To-Do app main page
interiorv1Description: Based on a clients project, made using HTML5, CSS3 and jQuery. Responsiveness by Flexbox. Extra plugins: Lightbox.js and Slick Carousel. This design was changed to what you can see in the first item on projects list.
interiorv1Alt: Screenshot of a Interior Ideas v1 main page
dobrywebdevDescription: Previous version of my portfolio, made using HTML5, CSS3 and jQuery. Responsiveness by Bootstrap 3.3.7. Extra plugins: Scrolling Nav and OwlCarousel2.
dobrywebdevAlt: Screenshot of a dobrywebdev.pl v1 main page
cvDescription: Simple CV template I've made just to convert it to PDF file. Made using HTML5 and CSS3.
cvAlt: Screenshot of a CV template main page
interactiveDescription: One of the first websites I've ever built, based on a free PSD file. Made using HTML5 and CSS3 with Bootstrap 3.3.7.
interactiveAlt: Screenshot of a Interactive Agency main page
formDescription: Simple form element I've done for the recruitment process in one of the companies I've applied to for Junior Front-End Developer position.
formAlt: Screenshot of a Animated Form main page
textPlaceholder: Hi! I really like your website.
cookies: This website is using cookies and your browser localStorage to store some settings and collect info on the visitors to provide usage statistics. If you do not agree to this, you can change your cookies preferences in your browser.
